Created.description: ISO-time of maintenance window creation (by whomever created this thing)

Description.description: User defined description of the maintenance window.

Expire.description: ISO 8601 Redfish-style time string after which we will automatically change state to Expired - null for no expire time

Modified.description: ISO-time of last maintenance window item update by updater (not client)

Name.description: User defined name of the maintenance window.

StartAfter.description: ISO 8601 Redfish-style time string of earliest execution.

title: #HpeMaintenanceWindow.v1_0_1.HpeMaintenanceWindow
